title: World's Best Comics
content:
I imagine this is hand drawn but does anyone know of a typeface similar to this?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134407im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202015-01-14%20at%2012_5768.03.52%20PM.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134407im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202015-01-14%20at%2012_5677.16.23%20PM.png)
author: mattbraun

comments.content:
A large collection of comic book fonts:  
 [http://www.comicbookfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134407/http:/www.comicbookfonts.com/ "http://www.comicbookfonts.com")
Thanks Nick, that's pretty close. I was also looking at Globe but it has a bit more contrast than I'm looking for.
